tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here pattern ribbed band chain 8 row 1 1 single_crochet into 2nd chain from your hook 1 single_crochet into each chain across spiked granny beanie row 2 blo chain 1 1 single_crochet in each st across repeat row 2 for how wide you want your ribbed band fasten_off your work video tutorial here and step by step photo tutorial here take ribbed band made and crochet the ends together with a single_crochet row down the edge it will create a ribbed effect to made the ribbed edge just made fasten_off weave ends body facing the seam made on the ribbed edge attach yarn to the stitch to the right of the seam row 1 chain 1 1 single_crochet into each st around slip_stitch into the 1st st to complete this row row 2 start at any st chain 3 2 double_crochet into same st *skip 2 sts 3 double_crochet into the next st repeat from * around slip_stitch into the 1st st to complete this row row 3 start at any space between blocks of 3 sts chain 3 *1 double_crochet space into st below 1 double_crochet into same chain space *skip 3 sts 1 double_crochet into next space between sts repeat from * around slip_stitch into the 1st st to complete this row you would now repeat row 3 for how long you want your hat when you re ready to finish your hat fasten_off your work video tutorial here and step by step photo tutorial here seam up the top video
